title: gofmt complains about parse error on code that the compiler accepts
body:
by **michael.elkins**: 
Before filing a bug, please check whether it has been fixed since
the latest release: run "hg pull -u" and retry what you did to
reproduce the problem.  Thanks.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. attempt to compile the attached iterable_test.go with 8g
2. attempt to run gofmt -w iterable_test.go
3.

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

Expect gofmt to be able to parse file, instead it errors:

iterable_test.go:354:35: expected ')', found '{'
iterable_test.go:368:50: expected ')', found '{'
iterable_test.go:374:47: expected ')', found '{'


What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
GOOS=linux
GOARCH=386

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
cf1a9b1f9bee+ tip


Please provide any additional information below.
Attachments: 1. iterable.go (9267 bytes) 1. iterable_test.go (11150 bytes)
